mapper.insert: insert into plan (user_id, title, start_date, end_date, memo, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{memo}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select plan_id, user_id, title, start_date, end_date, memo, created_at, updated_at from plan where plan_id = #{planId} and user_id = #{userId}
select count(plan_id) from plan where user_id = ${userId}
select plan_id, user_id, title, start_date, end_date, memo, created_at, updated_at from plan where user_id = ${userId} order by created_at desc
mapper.delete: delete from plan where plan_id = #{planId} and user_id = #{userId}
